content.rendered:
Install Bibledit on Ubuntu

Follow the steps below to install Bibledit.

  1. Open a terminal.
  2. On older versions of Ubuntu, or to get updated Bibledit software: Add the Bibledit repository:
    sudo add-apt-repository ppa:bibledit/ppa
    As of Ubuntu 18.04, the above is no longer needed.
  3. Read the repository:
    sudo apt update
  4. Install Bibledit:
    sudo apt install bibledit

Bibledit can be started from the menu.

More information: https://github.com/bibledit/cloud/issues/319

Home
Review
